input_text:
Job Title: Production Supervisor

Location: Byram, MS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Manufacturing, Production

Description:
Job Title: Production SupervisorFLSA Status: ExemptShift: DaysDepartment: Office/ProductionQualifications:Degree or equivalent experience preferred.have 2 years' experience in a manufacturing environment.of 1 years of manufacturing engineering experience with a beverage, food or liquid consumer products manufacturer is a plus.be experienced with GMP's, sanitation standards and FDA requirements.of several lines of equipment, e.g., debagging tray packaging systems, fillers, labellers, palletizers and conveyors.hours to manage multiple shifts.organizational and interpersonal skills.supervisory experience.Facilitation skills.communication skills - oral and written.Responsibilities:The Production Supervisor will be responsible for managing shift operations and related maintenance activities. Supervisors are responsible for maintaining a safe work group that is focused on quality, customer service, people development, and producing product at the lowest cost possible. Knowledge of maintenance and troubleshooting is a plus. This role will provide a successful candidate the opportunity to gain a well-rounded base of experience in both operations and engineering.Essential Job Duties:be experienced with GMP's, sanitation standards and FDA requirements.of several lines of equipment, e.g., debagging, tray packaging systems, fillers, labellers, palletizers and conveyors.in training operators in equipment operational procedures.commitments that production can make, making those commitments, and then executing to meet those commitments.the production resources in the most efficient manner possible.and executing to production schedule.on time delivery of our products to all our customers as dictated by the production schedule.and enforcing safety guidelines for all employees.safety training for all direct reports.the organization and cleanliness of the entire production area.proper maintenance and care to all machines, tools, forklifts, racks and all other equipment.to Logistics Supervisors, other Production Supervisors, Production Manager and all other parties concerned of any issues, concerns, and/or changes.all paperwork on time and accurately.of time sheets for accuracy relating to hours worked by employeesall required meetings.weekly safety meetings.have knowledge of the operation of all machines on the production line.the team in order to obtain the best results.contributions as a member of the Premium Waters management team to improve the organization and its image in any way possible.directs and motivates the efforts of personnel in the Production area of responsibility.GMP & PPE Required:While on the production floor in the plant, you will be required to follow and help to enforce all GMP regulations in the plant. Anyone entering the production floor must follow the GMP rules in their employee handbook, which includes the required hairnets, beard nets, and earplugs. It is also required that all personnel wear safety glasses. Follows standard operating procedures including quality checks and procedures for all operations. Also follows HACCP and SQF requirements for food quality and safety.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
